"The Subpalette":
"The \"Subpalette\" is a system which allows you to register up to 10 kinds of items, skills and so on, which you can then use in battle quickly with the following buttons:

・<%SubPaletteLeft> and <%SubPaletteRight> move the Subpalette cursor left and right, <%SubPalette> activates the selected slot.
・The [1]-[0] keys on your keyboard activate the corresponding slot immediately.

To register items, skills and so on to the Subpalette, open the Main Menu and select \"Equipment\", then \"Subpalette\"."
